node.title: When I'm arguing with a fool...
node.author: blazar

data.field: chances are he's doing the same certainly he's doing the same I'm in clpmisc, being told I am an elitist b**tard for pointing out that "it doesn't work" is not an appropriate description of the problem he's claiming Perl to be "constantly loosing ground on php" UR HLP CAN HAS BEEN SQL IS TOO MUCH DOCS PLZ SUPER URGENT THX.
